**Add search & filters (by campus and category)**

Description
-----------
Add server-side search and filtering for events so users can find events by campus and by category.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Backend endpoints that accept query parameters for `campus`, `category`, and `q` (free text).
- Paginated or limited result sets for listing endpoints.
- Frontend controls (selects/inputs) to filter and search events.

Labels: backend, frontend, enhancement
Estimate: small
